author: Brock
post_text: August 8, 2015 at 11:20 AM#1I Often meet a rig where some fixtures are hung 90 degrees of from the plan.These two macros change the stored pan values for the selection THROUGH THE ENTIRE SHOW! both in presets and cues.Have fun, but remember to make a backup before you run itFiles90 degrees pan.xml1.2 kB – 544 Downloads
title: Offset pan 90 degrees for selected fixtures.
